name: Cabin in the Snow (CaveBoy36)
description: Cabin in the Snow is a challenging puzzle game with 5 unique games to beat! All 5 range in difficulty, while they all share the same warm feeling. One of the main puzzles to solve in each game is to figure out what exactly you're solving! There are no instructions! Playing around with mechanics and learning out it works will help you out in the long run. Good Luck!
